targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rotation_window) as value
FROM (
  SELECT DATE_FORMAT(last_rotation_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00') as rotation_window,
         COUNT(*) as rotation_count
  FROM proxies
  WHERE active = true
    AND last_rotation_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR)
    AND last_rotation_at IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY rotation_window
  HAVING rotation_count >= 5
) cycles;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) as value
FROM proxies
WHERE active = true
  AND last_rotation_at IS NOT NULL
  AND last_rotation_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 15 MINUTE);

SELECT COUNT(*) as value
FROM proxy_requests pr
JOIN proxies p ON pr.proxy_id = p.device_id
WHERE pr.timestamp >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
  AND p.active = true
  AND p.last_rotation_at IS NOT NULL
  AND pr.timestamp BETWEEN DATE_SUB(p.last_rotation_at, INTERVAL 2 MINUTE) AND DATE_ADD(p.last_rotation_at, INTERVAL 5 MINUTE)
  AND pr.ip_changed = true;

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(rotation_window, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00')) as time_sec,
  rotation_count
FROM (
  SELECT DATE_FORMAT(last_rotation_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00') as rotation_window,
         COUNT(*) as rotation_count
  FROM proxies
  WHERE active = true
    AND last_rotation_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
    AND last_rotation_at IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY rotation_window
  HAVING rotation_count >= 5
  ORDER BY rotation_window DESC
) cycles
ORDER BY time_sec;

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(rotation_window, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00')) as time_sec,
  COUNT(*) as cycle_frequency
FROM (
  SELECT DATE_FORMAT(last_rotation_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00') as rotation_window,
         COUNT(*) as rotation_count
  FROM proxies
  WHERE active = true
    AND last_rotation_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
    AND last_rotation_at IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY rotation_window
  HAVING rotation_count >= 5
) cycles
GROUP BY rotation_window
ORDER BY time_sec;

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(pr.timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00')) as time_sec,
  COUNT(*) as total_tests,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN pr.status = 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 END) as successful_tests,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN pr.status = 'SUCCESS' THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) as success_rate,
  AVG(pr.response_time_ms) as avg_response_time
FROM proxy_requests pr
JOIN proxies p ON pr.proxy_id = p.device_id
WHERE pr.timestamp >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
  AND p.active = true
  AND p.last_rotation_at IS NOT NULL
  AND pr.timestamp BETWEEN DATE_SUB(p.last_rotation_at, INTERVAL 2 MINUTE) AND DATE_ADD(p.last_rotation_at, INTERVAL 5 MINUTE)
GROUP BY time_sec
ORDER BY time_sec;

SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE_FORMAT(pr.timestamp, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00')) as time_sec,
  COUNT(*) as total_requests,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN pr.ip_changed = true THEN 1 END) as ip_changes,
  COUNT(CASE WHEN pr.ip_changed = true THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) as ip_change_rate
FROM proxy_requests pr
JOIN proxies p ON pr.proxy_id = p.device_id
WHERE pr.timestamp >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
  AND p.active = true
  AND p.last_rotation_at IS NOT NULL
  AND pr.timestamp BETWEEN DATE_SUB(p.last_rotation_at, INTERVAL 2 MINUTE) AND DATE_ADD(p.last_rotation_at, INTERVAL 5 MINUTE)
GROUP BY time_sec
ORDER BY time_sec;

SELECT
  DATE_FORMAT(rotation_window, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as cycle_time,
  COUNT(DISTINCT device_id) as proxies_rotated,
  COUNT(*) as total_rotations,
  AVG(rotation_count) as avg_rotation_count,
  MAX(same_ip_count) as max_same_ip_count
FROM (
  SELECT
    DATE_FORMAT(last_rotation_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:00') as rotation_window,
    device_id,
    rotation_count,
    same_ip_count
  FROM proxies
  WHERE active = true
    AND last_rotation_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR)
    AND last_rotation_at IS NOT NULL
) rotations
GROUP BY rotation_window
HAVING proxies_rotated >= 5
ORDER BY cycle_time DESC
LIMIT 20;

SELECT rotation_status as metric, COUNT(*) as value
FROM proxies
WHERE active = true
GROUP BY rotation_status;

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(rotation_count), 0) as value
FROM proxies
WHERE active = true
  AND last_rotation_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 24 HOUR);

panels.title: Proxies with High Same IP Count (Potential Rotation Issues)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  name,
  location,
  last_ip,
  same_ip_count,
  rotation_count,
  rotation_status,
  last_rotation_at,
  updated_at
FROM proxies
WHERE active = true
  AND same_ip_count >= 10
ORDER BY same_ip_count DESC
LIMIT 20;
